TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit Collection`1<T> extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.Generic.ICollection`1<!T>, class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<!T>, class System.Collections.Generic.IList`1<!T>, class System.Collections.Generic.IReadOnlyCollection`1<!T>, class System.Collections.Generic.IReadOnlyList`1<!T>, class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable, class System.Collections.IList
Public Class Collection(Of T) Implements ICollection(Of T), IEnumerable(Of T), IList, IList(Of T), IReadOnlyCollection(Of T), IReadOnlyList(Of T)

generic <typename T> public ref class Collection : System::Collections::Generic::ICollection<T>, System::Collections::Generic::IEnumerable<T>, System::Collections::Generic::IList<T>, System::Collections::Generic::IReadOnlyCollection<T>, System::Collections::Generic::IReadOnlyList<T>, System::Collections::IList

span.span: The type of elements in the collection.

summary.span: 提供泛型集合的基类。

span.span: Provides the base class for a generic collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通过创建一个其构造类型的实例，可以立即使用类，你所要做的只是指定要在集合中包含的对象类型。The class can be used immediately by creating an instance of one of its constructed types; all you have to do is specify the type of object to be contained in the collection. 此外，你可以从任何构造类型，则派生您自己的集合类型或派生中的泛型集合类型类本身。In addition, you can derive your own collection type from any constructed type, or derive a generic collection type from the class itself. 类提供了可以用于自定义其行为时添加和移除项、 清除集合中，或将现有项的值设置的受保护的方法。The class provides protected methods that can be used to customize its behavior when adding and removing items, clearing the collection, or setting the value of an existing item. 大多数objectscan 进行修改。Most objectscan be modified. 但是，使用只读的初始化的对象无法修改对象。However, a object that is initialized with a read-only object cannot be modified. 请参阅为此类的一个只读版本。See for a read-only version of this class. 可以使用整数索引访问此集合中的元素。Elements in this collection can be accessed using an integer index. 在此集合中的索引是从零开始。Indexes in this collection are zero-based. 接受`null`引用为有效的值类型，并允许重复的元素。 accepts `null` as a valid value for reference types and allows duplicate elements. ## Examples 本部分包含两个代码示例。This section contains two code examples. 第一个示例演示了一些属性和方法的类。The first example demonstrates several properties and methods of the class. 第二个示例演示如何构造类型的派生集合类，以及如何重写的受保护的方法以提供自定义行为。The second example shows how to derive a collection class from a constructed type of , and how to override the protected methods of to provide custom behavior. 示例 1Example 1 下面的代码示例演示的许多属性和方法的。The following code example demonstrates many of the properties and methods of . 此代码示例创建一个字符串，使用集合方法将添加几个字符串显示，并列出这些字符串。The code example creates a collection of strings, uses the method to add several strings, displays the , and lists the strings. 该示例使用方法以查找在字符串的索引和方法来确定字符串是否是集合中。The example uses the method to find the index of a string and the method to determine whether a string is in the collection. 本示例将字符串使用使用默认值的方法和检索和设置字符串属性 （C# 中的索引器）。The example inserts a string using the method and retrieves and sets strings using the default property (the indexer in C#). 此示例删除字符串标识使用字符串方法和索引使用方法。The example removes strings by string identity using the method and by index using the method. 最后，方法用于清除集合中的所有字符串。Finally, the method is used to clear all strings from the collection. [!code-cpp[ObjectModel.Collection#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/ObjectModel.Collection/cpp/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ObjectModel.Collection#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/ObjectModel.Collection/cs/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ObjectModel.Collection#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/ObjectModel.Collection/VB/source.vb#1)] 示例 2Example 2 下面的代码示例演示如何构造类型的派生集合类泛型类，以及如何重写受保护， ， ，和方法以提供自定义行为， ， ，和方法，以及设置属性。The following code example shows how to derive a collection class from a constructed type of the generic class, and how to override the protected , , , and methods to provide custom behavior for the , , , and methods, and for setting the property. 此示例中提供的自定义行为是`Changed`则会在每个受保护的方法的末尾引发的通知事件。The custom behavior provided by this example is a `Changed` notification event that is raised at the end of each of the protected methods. `Dinosaurs`类继承`Collection`(`Collection(Of String)`在 Visual Basic 中)，并定义`Changed`事件，使用`DinosaursChangedEventArgs`事件信息和包含枚举来识别的更改的类型的类。The `Dinosaurs` class inherits `Collection` (`Collection(Of String)` in Visual Basic) and defines the `Changed` event, which uses a `DinosaursChangedEventArgs` class for the event information, and an enumeration to identify the kind of change. 此代码示例调用一些属性和方法的演示自定义事件。The code example calls several properties and methods of to demonstrate the custom event. [!code-csharp[ObjectModel.CollectionInherited#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/ObjectModel.CollectionInherited/cs/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ObjectModel.CollectionInherited#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/ObjectModel.CollectionInherited/VB/source.vb#1)]

threadsafe.span: 公共静态 (在 Visual Basic 中) 的此类型的成员都是线程安全。

span.span: Public static ( in Visual Basic) members of this type are thread safe.

threadsafe.span: 但不保证所有实例成员都是线程安全的。

span.span: Any instance members are not guaranteed to be thread safe.

threadsafe.span: A同时，可以支持多个读取器，只要不修改该集合。

span.span: A can support multiple readers concurrently, as long as the collection is not modified.

threadsafe.span: 即便如此，枚举整个集合本质上不是一个线程安全的过程。

span.span: Even so, enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure.

threadsafe.span: 若要确保枚举过程中的线程安全性，可以在整个枚举过程中锁定集合。

span.span: To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can lock the collection during the entire enumeration.

threadsafe.span: 若要允许多个线程访问集合以进行读写操作，则必须实现自己的同步。

span.span: To allow the collection to be accessed by multiple threads for reading and writing, you must implement your own synchronization.

para.span: 此基类用于轻松实现器来创建自定义集合。

span.span: This base class is provided to make it easier for implementers to create a custom collection.

para.span: 建议来扩展此基类的类，而不是创建其自己的实施者。

span.span: Implementers are encouraged to extend this base class instead of creating their own.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果使用默认构造函数创建对象，此方法可确定使用的默认相等比较器的相等性为`T`，列表中的值的类型。If the object is created using the default constructor, this method determines equality using the default equality comparer for `T`, the type of values in the list. 如果类型`T`不实现接口，使用方法。If type `T` does not implement the interface, the method is used. 如果集合对象由传递创建到构造函数中，对象方法将由使用由该接口对象。If the Collection object is created by passing an object to the constructor, the method will be determined by the interface used by that object. 此方法执行的线性搜索;因此，平均执行时间成正比。This method performs a linear search; therefore, the average execution time is proportional to . 也就是说，此方法为 O (`n`) 操作，其中`n`是。That is, this method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 检索此属性的值的运算复杂度为 O(1)。Retrieving the value of this property is an O(1) operation. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示的许多属性和方法的。The following code example demonstrates many of the properties and methods of . 此代码示例创建一个字符串，使用集合方法将添加几个字符串显示，并列出这些字符串。The code example creates a collection of strings, uses the method to add several strings, displays the , and lists the strings. 该示例使用方法以查找在字符串的索引和方法来确定字符串是否是集合中。The example uses the method to find the index of a string and the method to determine whether a string is in the collection. 本示例将字符串使用使用默认值的方法和检索和设置字符串属性 （C# 中的索引器）。The example inserts a string using the method and retrieves and sets strings using the default property (the indexer in C#). 此示例删除字符串标识使用字符串方法和索引使用方法。The example removes strings by string identity using the method and by index using the method. 最后，方法用于清除集合中的所有字符串。Finally, the method is used to clear all strings from the collection. [!code-cpp[ObjectModel.Collection#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/ObjectModel.Collection/cpp/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ObjectModel.Collection#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/ObjectModel.Collection/cs/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ObjectModel.Collection#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/ObjectModel.Collection/VB/source.vb#1)]

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerator`1<!T> GetEnumerator() cil managed
Public Function GetEnumerator () As IEnumerator(Of T)
public: virtual System::Collections::Generic::IEnumerator<T> ^ GetEnumerator();

summary.span: 返回循环访问 的枚举数。

span.span: Returns an enumerator that iterates through the .
An for the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `foreach` C# 语言的语句 (`for each` c + + 中`For Each`在 Visual Basic 中) 隐藏了枚举数的复杂性。The `foreach` statement of the C# language (`for each` in C++, `For Each` in Visual Basic) hides the complexity of the enumerators. 因此，建议使用 `foreach`，而不是直接操作枚举数。Therefore, using `foreach` is recommended, instead of directly manipulating the enumerator. 枚举器可用于读取集合中的数据，但不能用于修改基础集合。Enumerators can be used to read the data in the collection, but they cannot be used to modify the underlying collection. 最初，枚举数定位在集合中第一个元素的前面。Initially, the enumerator is positioned before the first element in the collection. 在此位置上，未定义 。At this position, is undefined. 因此，在读取 的值之前，必须调用 将枚举器向前移动到集合的第一个元素。Therefore, you must call to advance the enumerator to the first element of the collection before reading the value of . 在调用 之前， 返回相同的对象。 returns the same object until is called. 将 设置为下一个元素。 sets to the next element. 如果越过的末尾的集合，枚举数定位在集合中的最后一个元素的后面和返回`false`。If passes the end of the collection, the enumerator is positioned after the last element in the collection and returns `false`. 当枚举器位于此位置上，后续调用还返回`false`。When the enumerator is at this position, subsequent calls to also return `false`. 如果最后一次调用到返回`false`，是不确定的。If the last call to returned `false`, is undefined. 无法再次将 设置为集合的第一个元素；必须改为创建新的枚举器实例。You cannot set to the first element of the collection again; you must create a new enumerator instance instead. 只要集合保持不变，枚举数就保持有效。An enumerator remains valid as long as the collection remains unchanged. 如果对集合进行更改（如添加、修改或删除元素），则枚举数将失效且不可恢复，而且其行为是不确定的。If changes are made to the collection, such as adding, modifying, or deleting elements, the enumerator is irrecoverably invalidated and its behavior is undefined. 枚举数没有对集合的独占访问权；因此，从头到尾对一个集合进行枚举在本质上不是一个线程安全的过程。The enumerator does not have exclusive access to the collection; therefore, enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure. 若要确保枚举过程中的线程安全性，可以在整个枚举过程中锁定集合。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can lock the collection during the entire enumeration. 若要允许多个线程访问集合以进行读写操作，则必须实现自己的同步。To allow the collection to be accessed by multiple threads for reading and writing, you must implement your own synchronization. 集合中的默认实现不同步。Default implementations of collections in are not synchronized. 此方法为 o （1） 运算。This method is an O(1) operation.

returns.span: 如果找到，则为整个 中 第一个匹配项的从零开始的索引；否则为 -1。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 搜索向前从第一个元素开始和结束时间的最后一个元素。The is searched forward starting at the first element and ending at the last element. 此方法可确定使用的默认相等比较器的相等性为`T`，列表中的值的类型。This method determines equality using the default equality comparer for `T`, the type of values in the list. 此方法执行的线性搜索;因此，平均执行时间成正比。This method performs a linear search; therefore, the average execution time is proportional to . 也就是说，此方法为 O (`n`) 操作，其中`n`是。That is, this method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示的许多属性和方法的。The following code example demonstrates many of the properties and methods of . 此代码示例创建一个字符串，使用集合方法将添加几个字符串显示，并列出这些字符串。The code example creates a collection of strings, uses the method to add several strings, displays the , and lists the strings. 该示例使用方法以查找在字符串的索引和方法来确定字符串是否是集合中。The example uses the method to find the index of a string and the method to determine whether a string is in the collection. 本示例将字符串使用使用默认值的方法和检索和设置字符串属性 （C# 中的索引器）。The example inserts a string using the method and retrieves and sets strings using the default property (the indexer in C#). 此示例删除字符串标识使用字符串方法和索引使用方法。The example removes strings by string identity using the method and by index using the method. 最后，方法用于清除集合中的所有字符串。Finally, the method is used to clear all strings from the collection. remarks.format: ## Remarks 接受`null`引用为有效的值类型，并允许重复的元素。 accepts `null` as a valid value for reference types and allows duplicate elements. 可以使用下面的语法通过此属性访问集合中的特定元素：`myCollection[index]`。This property provides the ability to access a specific element in the collection by using the following syntax: `myCollection[index]`. C# 语言使用关键字进行定义而不是实现索引器属性。The C# language uses the keyword to define the indexers instead of implementing the property. Visual Basic 将 实现为默认属性，该属性提供相同的索引功能。Visual Basic implements as a default property, which provides the same indexing functionality. 检索此属性的值的运算 o （1）;设置属性也是 o （1） 运算。Retrieving the value of this property is an O(1) operation; setting the property is also an O(1) operation. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示的许多属性和方法的。The following code example demonstrates many of the properties and methods of . 此代码示例创建一个字符串，使用集合方法将添加几个字符串显示，并列出这些字符串。The code example creates a collection of strings, uses the method to add several strings, displays the , and lists the strings. 该示例使用方法以查找在字符串的索引和方法来确定字符串是否是集合中。The example uses the method to find the index of a string and the method to determine whether a string is in the collection. 本示例将字符串使用使用默认值的方法和检索和设置字符串属性 （C# 中的索引器）。The example inserts a string using the method and retrieves and sets strings using the default property (the indexer in C#). 此示例删除字符串标识使用字符串方法和索引使用方法。The example removes strings by string identity using the method and by index using the method. 最后，方法用于清除集合中的所有字符串。Finally, the method is used to clear all strings from the collection. .property instance bool System.Collections.Generic.ICollection<T>.IsReadOnly
ReadOnly Property IsReadOnly As Boolean Implements ICollection(Of T).IsReadOnly
property bool System.Collections.Generic.ICollection<T>.IsReadOnly { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示 是否为只读。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the is read-only.

value.span: 如果 是只读的，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the is read-only; otherwise, .

value.span: 在 的默认实现中，此属性始终返回 。

span.span: In the default implementation of , this property always returns .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在创建只读集合后，该集合不允许添加、移除或修改元素。A collection that is read-only does not allow the addition, removal, or modification of elements after the collection is created. 集合是只读的是只是一个集合与防止集合; 进行修改的包装因此，如果对基础集合进行更改，只读集合将反映这些更改。A collection that is read-only is simply a collection with a wrapper that prevents modifying the collection; therefore, if changes are made to the underlying collection, the read-only collection reflects those changes. 检索此属性的值的运算复杂度为 O(1)。Retrieving the value of this property is an O(1) operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 集合中的默认实现不同步。Default implementations of collections in are not synchronized. 枚举整个集合本质上不是一个线程安全的过程。Enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure. 若要确保枚举过程中的线程安全性，可以在整个枚举过程中锁定集合。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can lock the collection during the entire enumeration. 若要允许多个线程访问集合以进行读写操作，则必须实现自己的同步。To allow the collection to be accessed by multiple threads for reading and writing, you must implement your own synchronization. 返回可以用于对访问进行同步的对象。 returns an object that can be used to synchronize access to the . 同步是仅当所有线程在访问该集合之前都锁定此对象有效。Synchronization is effective only if all threads lock this object before accessing the collection. 检索此属性的值的运算复杂度为 O(1)。Retrieving the value of this property is an O(1) operation.

summary.span: 返回循环访问集合的枚举数。

span.span: Returns an enumerator that iterates through a collection.

returns.span: 可用于循环访问集合的 。

span.span: An that can be used to iterate through the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `foreach` C# 语言的语句 (`for each` c + + 中`For Each`在 Visual Basic 中) 隐藏了枚举数的复杂性。The `foreach` statement of the C# language (`for each` in C++, `For Each` in Visual Basic) hides the complexity of the enumerators. 因此，建议使用 `foreach`，而不是直接操作枚举数。Therefore, using `foreach` is recommended, instead of directly manipulating the enumerator. 枚举器可用于读取集合中的数据，但不能用于修改基础集合。Enumerators can be used to read the data in the collection, but they cannot be used to modify the underlying collection. 最初，枚举数定位在集合中第一个元素的前面。Initially, the enumerator is positioned before the first element in the collection. 也会将枚举器放回此位置。 also brings the enumerator back to this position. 在此位置上，未定义 。At this position, is undefined. 因此，在读取 的值之前，必须调用 将枚举器向前移动到集合的第一个元素。Therefore, you must call to advance the enumerator to the first element of the collection before reading the value of . 在调用 或 之前， 返回同一对象。 returns the same object until either or is called. 将 设置为下一个元素。 sets to the next element. 如果越过的末尾的集合，枚举数定位在集合中的最后一个元素的后面和返回`false`。If passes the end of the collection, the enumerator is positioned after the last element in the collection and returns `false`. 当枚举器位于此位置上，后续调用还返回`false`。When the enumerator is at this position, subsequent calls to also return `false`. 如果最后一次调用到返回`false`，是不确定的。If the last call to returned `false`, is undefined. 若要再次将 设置为集合的第一个元素，可以调用 并接着调用 。To set to the first element of the collection again, you can call followed by . 只要集合保持不变，枚举数就保持有效。An enumerator remains valid as long as the collection remains unchanged. 如果对集合进行更改（如添加、修改或删除元素），则枚举数将失效且不可恢复，而且其行为是不确定的。If changes are made to the collection, such as adding, modifying, or deleting elements, the enumerator is irrecoverably invalidated and its behavior is undefined. 枚举数没有对集合的独占访问权；因此，从头到尾对一个集合进行枚举在本质上不是一个线程安全的过程。The enumerator does not have exclusive access to the collection; therefore, enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure. 若要确保枚举过程中的线程安全性，可以在整个枚举过程中锁定集合。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can lock the collection during the entire enumeration. 若要允许多个线程访问集合以进行读写操作，则必须实现自己的同步。To allow the collection to be accessed by multiple threads for reading and writing, you must implement your own synchronization. 集合中的默认实现不同步。Default implementations of collections in are not synchronized. 此方法为 o （1） 运算。This method is an O(1) operation.

property bool System.Collections.IList.IsFixedSize { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示 是否具有固定大小。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the has a fixed size.

value.span: 如果 具有固定大小，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the has a fixed size; otherwise, .

value.span: 在 的默认实现中，此属性始终返回 。

span.span: In the default implementation of , this property always returns .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 具有固定大小的集合在创建之后不能再添加或移除元素，但是允许修改现有元素。A collection with a fixed size does not allow the addition or removal of elements after the collection is created, but it allows the modification of existing elements. 具有固定大小的集合是只是一个集合的包装器防止添加和移除元素;因此，如果对基础集合，包括添加或移除元素，进行更改的固定大小的集合将反映这些更改。A collection with a fixed size is simply a collection with a wrapper that prevents adding and removing elements; therefore, if changes are made to the underlying collection, including the addition or removal of elements, the fixed-size collection reflects those changes. 检索此属性的值的运算复杂度为 O(1)。Retrieving the value of this property is an O(1) operation.

property bool System.Collections.IList.IsReadOnly { bool get(); };

value.span: 在 的默认实现中，此属性始终返回 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在创建只读集合后，该集合不允许添加、移除或修改元素。A collection that is read-only does not allow the addition, removal, or modification of elements after the collection is created. 集合是只读的是只是一个集合与防止集合; 进行修改的包装因此，如果对基础集合进行更改，只读集合将反映这些更改。A collection that is read-only is simply a collection with a wrapper that prevents modifying the collection; therefore, if changes are made to the underlying collection, the read-only collection reflects those changes. 检索此属性的值的运算复杂度为 O(1)。Retrieving the value of this property is an O(1) operation.

C# 语言使用[这](~/docs/csharp/language-reference/keywords/this.md)关键字来定义而不是实现索引器属性。The C# language uses the [this](~/docs/csharp/language-reference/keywords/this.md) keyword to define the indexers instead of implementing the property. Visual Basic 将 实现为默认属性，该属性提供相同的索引功能。Visual Basic implements as a default property, which provides the same indexing functionality. 检索此属性的值的运算 o （1）;设置属性也是 o （1） 运算。Retrieving the value of this property is an O(1) operation; setting the property is also an O(1) operation.
